attributes.action: Move forward with a WTO deal, ready to leave the EU as agreed on 29th Mar 2019.
attributes.background: The people overwhelmingly voted to leave the EU. We were not asked if we wanted a deal such as PM May's which was a complete capitulation. We just voted to leave - this is what should now happen. It is the default option, voted on by Parliament and should now be backed by all the MPs in the House.
